author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I would prefer finalizing 3155 and creating a new eip for the eof fields, since 3155 has been implemented as is by many people, within and outside of the Ethereum ecosystem

author: _shemnon
content: PR to move 3155 to last call and then final on 1 Sep, formatting edits, and update code sample - https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8798
